https://tmrev.io/movie/81210-Aniki-Bóbó 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/za2TPdXgU1mMO0NV9bekJok8MLG.jpg It is Manoel de Oliveira's first feature-length film. Mostly children, from Oliveira's hometown, Porto, play in its story. Aniki-Bóbó is a rhyme from a children's game, akin to Eeny, meeny, miny, moe. Aniki-Bóbó
